english.segment1: It rips me up " spits me out " I'm messed up " in this rut -. Caught up in this system " put down as another victim -. my fingernails are fading away " and my hair is looking lazy -. but that's okay, yeah, but I think I may go crazy -
english.segment2: this time I have don't feel my own -. this life I live feels like a joke. -. but still I try to take control -. still on my own, all alone -
english.segment3: here I go again " go " I lie awake -. In my car " at the park " I "I run away -. It's half past three and I can't sleep -. looking up at the stars " looking up in the dark -
